entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
